typical_activities: Casting: pour, compact, cure, waterproof if needed
items.notes: Simple excavation + concrete pour. Typically no reinforcement.
Requires rebar design, lapping, chairs. Ask about rebar diameter/type.
Linear foundation. Calculate: length × cross-section area.
Large area foundation. Consider pour sequence and joints.
Heavy reinforcement. Control shrinkage and concrete feed.
Ask about depth/width. Requires temporary support.
Common sections: 300x300, 400x400 mm. Count or volume basis.
Requires formwork and temporary support. Account for props/shores.
Excavate to bottom of footing level.
Testing required. May need engineer approval.
Ensure protection board if backfill required.

items.implementation_notes: - حفر إلى مستوى الـ bottom footing

typical_activities: Board over membrane before backfill or screed
